data_table.description: Exclusions for Brain MRI and Neuropsychology Measures (Generation 3), measured from June 2009 to December 2011. This dataset provides possible exclusions (prevalent stroke, dementia, other neurological condition) that correspond to the dataset vr_mrnp_2011_3_0665s.

variable.name: np_excludeON
variable.description: Exclude for brain injury or disease other than prevalent stroke or dementia at the time of the Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: np_ExcludeDEM
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent Dementia at time of Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: np_ExcludeSTRK
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent Stroke at time of Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: mri_excludeON
variable.description: Exclude for brain injury or disease other than prevalent stroke or dementia at the time of the MRI

variable.name: mri_ExcludeDEM
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent Dementia at time of MRI

variable.name: mri_ExcludeSTRK
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent Stroke at time of MRI

variable.name: np_date
variable.comment: Date includes month, day and year, however coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality. For SHARe: this variable is number of days since exam 1, do not format as a date. Number of days since exam 1.

variable.name: mri_date
variable.comment: Date includes month, day and year, however coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality. For SHARe: this variable is number of days since exam 1, do not format as a date. Number of days since exam 1.
